title: How to teach children about climate change, inspire hope and take action to change the future
author: Anonymous
excerpt: Some children and youth find the effects of climate change are traumatic. Taking a trauma-informed approach to education can nurture resilience.
summary: Some children and youth find the effects of climate change are traumatic. Taking a trauma-informed approach to education can nurture resilience.

title: Businesses ‘more concerned than ever'
author: Anonymous
excerpt: Australian business leaders are more concerned about climate change than ever before, with a new report finding there has been a significant shift in opinion in just eight months.
summary: Australian business leaders are more concerned about climate change than ever before, with a new report finding there has been a significant shift in opinion in just eight months.
